events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product is damaged and not working properly. There are visible scratches and the device doesn't switch on.
The reported problem has been categorised as a product defect due to damage and malfunction reported by the customer.
An agent from the technical support team has been assigned to address the customer's issue about the faulty product.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear your product arrived damaged. I'll do my best to help you resolve this issue quickly.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and any damage, along with the serial number of the device to help us assess the issue?
I have attached photos showing the scratches and the device remains completely unresponsive when I try to turn it on.
Thank you for the details. We can offer you a replacement device or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer the replacement device as I still want to use this product and hope the next one arrives in perfect condition.
We have processed your replacement request. The new device will be shipped shortly and you will receive a tracking number via email.
We wanted to check if the replacement device arrived and if it is functioning properly. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
The replacement has arrived and works perfectly. Thank you for the prompt support and handling of my issue.
We are glad everything is resolved. We are closing this support case now. Thank you for contacting us!
